hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
SELECT client.client AS longId, client.szShortName AS shortName, CONVERT(client.Name_Client + client.Name_Client_2, SQL_CHAR) AS fullName, client.NotResident as residental, persn.LastName AS surName, persn.Name AS firstName, persn.Patronymic AS patrName, persn.BirthDate AS birthDay, '' AS birthPlace, persn.Sex as sex, addressEmail.Address as email, addressHomePhone.Address as homePhone, addressJobPhone.Address as jobPhone, addressMobilePhone.Address as mobilePhone, regDocInn.RegNum as inn, country.FullName as citizenship
FROM client_dbt AS client INNER JOIN persn_dbt AS persn ON client.client = persn.ClientID AND client.LegalForm = 2 LEFT JOIN address_dbt as addressEmail ON addressEmail.Client = persn.ClientID and addressEmail.AdrType = 3 and addressEmail.ConType=2 LEFT JOIN address_dbt as addressJobPhone ON addressJobPhone.Client = persn.ClientID and addressJobPhone.AdrType = 1 and addressJobPhone.ConType=2 and addressJobPhone.ConKind='Рабочий' LEFT JOIN address_dbt as addressHomePhone ON addressHomePhone.Client = persn.ClientID and addressHomePhone.AdrType = 1 and addressHomePhone.ConType=2 and addressHomePhone.ConKind='Домашний' LEFT JOIN address_dbt as addressMobilePhone ON addressMobilePhone.Client = persn.ClientID and addressMobilePhone.AdrType = 1 and addressMobilePhone.ConType=2 and addressMobilePhone.ConKind='Мобильный' LEFT JOIN regdoc_dbt as regDocInn ON regDocInn.Client = persn.ClientID and regDocInn.RDKind = 100 LEFT JOIN clcoun_dbt as country ON country.CodeLat3 = client.szCountryNR WHERE client.client = :personId

SELECT client.client AS longId, client.szShortName AS shortName, CONVERT(client.Name_Client + client.Name_Client_2, SQL_CHAR) AS fullName, client.NotResident as residental, client.Name_Client AS surName, client.Name_Client_2 AS firstName, persn.Patronymic AS patrName, persn.BirthDate AS birthDay, '' AS birthPlace, persn.Sex as sex, '' as email, '' as homePhone, '' as jobPhone, '' as mobilePhone, '' as inn, '' as citizenship
FROM client_dbt AS client INNER JOIN persn_dbt AS persn ON client.client = persn.ClientID AND client.LegalForm = 2 WHERE (:extra_like_surName IS NULL OR persn.LastName LIKE :extra_like_surName) AND (:extra_like_firstName IS NULL OR persn.Name LIKE :extra_like_firstName) AND (:extra_like_patrName IS NULL OR persn.Patronymic LIKE :extra_like_patrName)

SELECT regdoc.Client AS kPersonId, regdoc.RDKind AS kPaperKind, docInfo.Name AS documentType, regdoc.DocNum AS docNumber, regdoc.Series AS docSeries, regdoc.IssueDate AS docIssueDate, CONVERT(regdoc.RegName + regdoc.RegName_2, SQL_CHAR) AS docIssueBy, docInfo.Name AS docTypeName, regdoc.Subdivision AS docIssueByCode, 1 AS docIdentify FROM regdoc_dbt AS regdoc, paprkind_dbt AS docInfo, client_dbt AS client WHERE client.client = :kPersonId AND regdoc.Client = :kPersonId AND docInfo.PaperKind = regDoc.RDKind AND regdoc.IsMain = 'X' And ((Select rdkind.DocType from rdkind_dbt As rdkind where rdkind.RDKind = regdoc.RDKind) = 1)
